page.title: 12RUISLIP MANOR SHOPS/LIBRARY
page.content: Most of the people who own or manage shops in Ruislip Manor do not live in the area, but travel in from other areas. 80% of all the managers had not been in their present job for more than 8 months. Only 12 of the shops are owned by a larger chain or corporation. None of the shops have been handed down from one generation to the next. Apart from food shops ladies hairdressers were plentiful, with 5 salons in one short stretch. The owners/managers of the salons said that there was no shortage of clients. The library is one of the largest buildings in Ruislip Manor, and has so far survived attempts by the council to close it to save money. The local people protested at this proposal and organised a successful petition. There is little doubt that Ruislip Manor is in a continuous state of change.
